Bio

I'm Jingyu, currently a master student at University of Illinois. I love the process of designing, implementing and adjusting the layout of a website to maximize user experience. I'm comfortable with React.js, Node.js, and I'm also familiar with Vue.js. I'm interested in opportunities related to front end and full stack web development.
